mdRecord.dcterms:title: What Wall?, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Eric Owen Moss Architects (American architectural firm, contemporary) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The What Wall is a simple addition to a building that was originally an industrial warehouse. The new tenants, a software development company, are housed within the warehouse, with a new executive office and conference room bulging out in a counterpoint to the long flat wall. -- http://www.mimoa.eu/projects/United States/Culver City/What Wall [work]

mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: 3524 Hayden Avenue, Culver City, Los Angeles, California, United States
